org.fluentjava.reflection
Class Mirror

java.lang.Object
  org.fluentjava.reflection.Mirror

public class Mirror
extends java.lang.Object

A class that that provides reflective facilities over an object. Throughout the documentation, we refer to the subject of reflection as mirrored object. A mirror can be priviliged (with access to private methods and fields) or unpriviliged (without).
